plot: Teresa accidentally comes across Pablo, her old college love. Fifteen years ago they had each left their country believing the other dead at the hands of a military dictatorship, and they must now come to terms with their past.
title: Todo cambia
plot_es: Teresa accidentally comes across Pablo, her old college love. Fifteen years ago they had each left their country believing the other dead at the hands of a military dictatorship, and they must now come to terms with their past.
